review.title: “It is one of the better companies of travel industry in INDIA today,it also has 3 offices in USA..”
review.pros: Pros – working here gives a first hand experience in the travel industry of India,you actually get to know how important industry this one is and how good a career one can make from here,it is a very good place to start your career and the company is so friendly to the staffs that you can plan your retirement from here itself.This company is basically one of the largest consolidator of Air Tickets in India and apart from this it is also a very good service provider of the other allied services such as visas,Insurance,Holidays and Forex.
review.cons: Cons – Holidays are bit lesser than other companies.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Management is doing a very good work,my advice to management is to maintain their standard.
review.recommended: – I'm optimistic about the outlook for this company

review.title: “good administration, company is good, having branches all over India , and overseas”
review.pros: Pros – good boss,good support , people are very friendly, homely atmosphere. supporting for the growth.on time salary. potentiality for enchanting our skills .
review.cons: Cons – company has to concentrate world. because MNC's are occupying the opportunity.even employees has to concentrate towards professionalization.
